title: old music venue font?"
content:
Hello guys, I am stuck on this font. Any ideas? Thank you for looking.

Font: 

 Airkraft

author: snipa21

comments.content: It's an old Letraset face, but the name escapes me at the moment...

Yes Nick and Fivos, you have it! Airkraft is in my old Letraset catalog. It's by somebody called Face Photosetting. Interesting alphabet. There is a digital by John Bishop [http://www.fontpalace.com/font-details/Airkraft/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317133915/http:/www.fontpalace.com/font-details/Airkraft/ "http://www.fontpalace.com/font-details/Airkraft/")  
Don
